text:
My name is Kelly Labrador. I'm located in Paris,
as a Client Capability Lead at DXC Technology.

I'm the first point of contact for our
customers within our organization.
I take care of their technical requests
and my responsibility is to ensure
that the service delivered by
our technical teams are met.

I have a Master's Degree in Economics and a
Postgraduate Degree in Business Administration.

I decided to go to the cloud
because my company
started a massive public cloud training program.

I started my training by taking an
online AWS cloud practitioner training
Then I followed by a five days online training on architecting on AWS.
I finally took the AWS Certified Solution Architect exam in January 2019.
I was re-certified in 2022.
Preparing for an exam takes time and you need the endurance to achieve your goal.

Getting my certificate made me proud
and has given me more confidence,
in my ability to learn outside of school.
So preparing for my AWS certification has giving me a better
understanding of the need of our customers.
Training in the cloud, AWS, provided me
with a knowledge base and skill set

that made me an eligible candidate
for future assignments in my company.

After getting my certification,
I had the opportunity to work
as a Technical Project Manager on the AWS cloud migration project
for one of our insurance clients.

My skills allowed me to contribute to the
successful deployment of this application on AWS.
